column4: when i star my computer and take the option to boot from ubuntu its show me some errors like: can not read block xxxxxxx  any help pleae???
when i star my computer and take the option to boot from ubuntu its show me some errors like: can not read block xxxxxxx and take forever to star ubuntu
it seems like corrupted fs to me... use fsck from a livecd to check partitions
you have to specify the target partition 'sudo fsck /dev/....'
